review.title: Very quiet but near freeway
review.reviewText: Quick check in and out staff very courteous rooms were clean fully equipped

review.title: Meets basic needs
review.reviewText: If you need a kitchen this place works. Because of the area the hotel leaves no dishes, pots, pans or silverware, etc. in the room. You have to request these things. It's not the staffs fault but it was inconvenient.

review.title: Homeless shelter
review.reviewText: This Hotel gives out vouchers for the homeless and it appeared that most guests had very large dogs. When you walk down the hall you hear many different dogs barking. And I would only rate this a two star hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: Clean up the clientele.

review.title: Freeway close
review.reviewText: Very basic, mimimal room. Ok room for our needs. Has full kitchen, which we did not use. Bed was uncomfortable, each side rolled to center. Bathroom sink did not drain quickly. "Continental breakfast" was coffee and a small muffin. The staff called it "grab and go". Cheapest hotel we could find, and was quite surprised at what we got for $110 a night.

review.title: Nice hotel and area
review.reviewText: Great hotel with spacious rooms.  I only needed to stay two nights, but for a longer stay this would be perfect with a full kitchen.  My only complaint is the continental breakfast is less than desirable.  There was coffee, fruit, oatmeal, and granola bars.  I was disappointed and so was my child.

review.title: Terrible room and service
review.reviewText: Room cleanup only once a week, room conditions are terrible. no further comment

review.title: two star
review.reviewText: Breakfast was instant oatmeal and coffee. Really! Bathroom floor was dirty.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for sharing your experience with us.  I sincerely apologize that you did not have a comfortable stay.  To uphold our company’s high standards, I will retrain our front desk staff on our check-in procedures and will make sure we are thoroughly inspecting our linens and mattresses.  I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention.  We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better experience the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Conveniently Uncomfortable
review.reviewText: We selected the hotel based on it's location to Menlo Park where we were attending a conference. We typically stay in 4-5 star hotels, with boutique hotels being our favorites. We were shocked to find anything three stars or above were well over $400/night. The gentleman who checked us in, muddled through the process, taking quite a long time to process a reservation that had been prepaid. Our room was out-dated and extremely dark. However, unless we wanted a smoking room, no other rooms were available. In all fairness the room was clean and had been freshly painted. However, when we retired for the night we noticed the sheets were stained, thread-bare and very scratchy. We would have switched hotels, but by this time there was little availability and the cost was ridiculous. We had booked for a two night stay. The room had not been serviced, perhaps as it was an extended-stay. I ended up purchasing a set of sheets for us to sleep on. The bed was also hard and uncomfortable. We could hear every sound from the hall way and as we were on the street level, we were unable to open our drapes for more light, as we were located near the front of the hotel and could see everyone entering the hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: The location was close to our conference site.
review.negativeRemarks: New beds, sheets and lighting. Perhaps sound proofing the rooms.
review.locationRemarks: Half an hour away from San Francisco and 10 minutes to Sanford University.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I am so glad that you had a great stay!  I truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our spacious rooms and fully equipped kitchens.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Nice staff, nice, clean rooms.
review.reviewText:
Overall it was another good experience.  I will be using this hotel each time I am driving through.
It's normally very quiet.
review.positiveRemarks: Size of the room, able to pay cash deposit, quiet, has kitchenette's in rooms.
review.negativeRemarks: The barking dog at the end of the hallway on the first floor(manager's room).
review.locationRemarks: Right off Freeway(101).  Nothing around to walk to, but can drive to many restaurants/places to eat.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I’m so pleased to read that you had a great stay at our hotel and enjoyed our friendly customer service.  I truly appreciate your comments regarding our fully equipped kitchens and our convenient location.  The staff and I would like to thank you again for posting your review.  We look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

review.title: Amazing Staff
review.reviewText: We arrived later than expected and Patricia checked us in quickly provided us with directions to the event that we were attending she was just a fantastic person to deal with made everything so easy in what was a very eventful weekend for me. I would highly recommend staying here it is clean has a kitchen for cooking if you need that.
review.positiveRemarks: STAFF is super helpful and nice.
review.locationRemarks: It was close to Starbucks, Jamba Juice and some local shopping.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that our amenities were not to your expectations.  In response to your feedback, I will make sure we are clearly communicating our amenities during guest arrivals.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Looks better in pictures than in person
review.reviewText: Overpriced.  Dull location.  No gym.  'Breakfast' consists of oranges, apples (the red-delicious type), coffee, snack bars, and instant oatmeal.
review.negativeRemarks: Add a gym.  Better breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Restaurants are located el camino real.  Starbuck's about 3 blocks north.  Crunch gym offers a $15 daily pass.

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us.  Please accept our apologies for the cleanliness issues you experienced.  To uphold our company’s high standards, I will be reviewing our cleaning and room inspection procedures with our staff.  Our team is committed to satisfying our guests, so we are very thankful for your feedback.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Save your money and stay somewhere cheaper!
review.reviewText:
This was the dirtiest hotel I have ever stayed in!  Anything covered in fabric was sticky and filthy, carpet disgusting.   The bed was the worst.  There was a dirty imprint on top of the bedspread in the shape of a large body, and a permanent indentation in the mattress that matched.  It looked like someone had an "extended stay" in our room, come back every evening after work and flopped down in the same spot to watch TV . . . then stayed there for hours.  Had the rest of the room not been so filthy we would have asked for another room, but I don't think it would have made a difference.  I couldn't imagine that other rooms would have been that different.

The corridors and room smelled moldy and musty.  The staff wasn't exactly rude, they just didn't smile or speak.  No one asked us how are stay was when we checked out.  They either didn't care or were afraid of what the answer would be!

That we had to pay $195.00 for this room is unbelievable to me!  I guess its a question of supply and demand in the area.  Save your money and go stay at a local, budget place instead.  Or bring your own cleaning supplies!
review.negativeRemarks: Gut the place and refurbish all the rooms.

managementResponses.response: Thank you so much for posting a review of our property.  I’m so pleased to read that you had a great stay at our hotel!  I truly appreciate your kind comments regarding our friendly staff and comfortable rooms.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.reviewText: If your traveling for business this is the place to stay. Rooms are big, clean and hotel staff is great.

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  Please accept our apologies that your stay was not to our company’s high standards.  In response to your feedback, I will make sure we are clearly communicating our amenities during guest arrivals.  Thanks to your feedback, we can continue to work on providing an exceptional stay for all of our guests.  We would love to have another chance to provide you with a better experience at our hotel the next time you're in town.

review.title: Long ways from business schedule.
review.reviewText: Miss lead about where location was. Not being familiar with the area I thought when they posted this hotel in the San Francisco/San Carlos area it would be near South San Francisco where I had to go for my business. Nothing was said about not making bed or changing towels everyday. The breakfast was a pick and go. No protein and not many choices.
review.negativeRemarks: Better description of the hotel and be more accurate about the facts
review.locationRemarks: Nothing around or close by. I wasn't there to look for things to do.

managementResponses.response: The staff and I read your comments about your stay with us.  We strive to provide guests with all the comforts of home, so I am disappointed to hear that we did not meet your expectations.  In response to your feedback, I will work with our staff to make sure we are responding to guest needs in a timely manner as well as making sure we are thoroughly inspecting rooms.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Where Not to stay
review.reviewText: Stayed at location based on past experiences with this chain. This was unlike any of the other hotels in the chain. It was nearly impossible to get a hold of an attendant at night and during the day, there was only one poor attendant manning the front desk that was pulling multiple duties. In addition, there was mold in our shower and no spare sheets or extra pillows for a studio room with a fold-out sofa/sleeper.
review.negativeRemarks: Customer care. More attendants
review.locationRemarks: Near airport and shopping center

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond.  I sincerely apologize for the billing and cleanliness issues you experienced.  Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will make sure we are thoroughly inspecting rooms as well as reviewing our billing procedures to ensure your experience is not repeated.  We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.  We do hope you will choose to stay with us again so we can have the opportunity to provide you with a better experience.

review.title: Don't book this hotel
review.reviewText: There were some dog wastes in front of our room door, and we did not know where were they come from. We asked front desk to help for cleaning up around 10 pm, but no one came to clean up until morning. The most awful thing is that they CHARGED us $75 for the dog wastes when we checked out. TERRIBLE!

managementResponses.response: I received a copy of your review, and wanted to take a moment to personally respond. The situation you described is unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that I have taken appropriate action with our staff to ensure your experience is not repeated. Your feedback is very important to us, so thank you for sharing.

review.title: Very Disappointed/Not What you'd Expect!!
review.reviewText: First off, the hotel staff sucked. The night guy Joel was rude and did not do anything about things we asked for or needed. We never received items asked for or additional help from anyone else. Second, the room was not clean and the bathroom shower/tub was disgusting. The stove in the room was not cleaned; you could see food, seasoning, and grease on the stove. The bathroom shower/tub was not clean; it was dirty on the walls/tiles, floor, and around the corners of the tub; very gross. Third, the bed was awful. I could not even sleep comfortably, yet alone at all because any move...and I mean any...the bed would squeak so bad.
review.positiveRemarks: Nothing. It was not even worth the price of 110.00 a night!
review.negativeRemarks: Everything...hotel staff, cleanness of room, and better quality of bed.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am proud of our staff for meeting your expectations and providing you with exceptional customer service.  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.reviewText: This was a very pleasant surprise!  The room was exceptionally clean, easy to locate and the staff went above and beyond!  I would highly recommend this place to anyone in the area.  Only down side was the continental breakfast, absolute bare minimum.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. The situation you described is unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. To make sure this doesn't happen again, I am coaching our staff. Thank you very much for bringing this to our attention.

review.reviewText:
Not happy with this hotel and experience!
Staff not helpful at all!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. I sincerely apologize for the service and cleanliness issues you experienced. I will use this comments as a training tool to ensure you experience is not repeated. I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. Thank you again for your feedback.

review.title: ants in bathroom
review.reviewText: Could be a fluke, but I've never had that experience before and I travel a lot so having a parade of ants on the bathroom floor and counter is a huge strike against this hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: The receptionist was borderline rude and arrogant to us upon arrival. I was with others who noticed this as well.
review.locationRemarks: Near SFO, 1/2 hour from Half Moon Bay. Located in corporate/industrial area along the 101.

managementResponses.response: Your review for our hotel was recently brought to my attention. Your comments were reviewed by the staff, and we will use this as a training tool to make sure your experience is not repeated. We continually work to improve our hotel, so I really appreciate you providing us with your feedback.

review.reviewText: Pigeon feathers next to the bed, and woke up with tick bites.

managementResponses.response: I want to thank you for taking the time to post a review of your stay.  I am thrilled that we were able to accommodate your needs with a home away from home experience!  Once more, thank you for posting your review.  We look forward to having you visit with us again in the future.

review.title: Excellent motel for a great price.
review.reviewText: Excellent motel, very clean, convenient, very great value.  I will definitely stay here again on my business trips to the Penninsula.   Makes the high-end hotels around the SFO airport look very overpriced.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for providing us with details about your stay. I sincerely apologize for your experience. To uphold our company's high standards, we will make sure we are inspecting rooms prior to guest arrivals as well as ensuring that we are quickly responding to guest needs. Thank you for your review.

review.title: Low recommendation.
review.reviewText: Took more than 1/2 hr just waiting for someone to show up at the front desk so we can check in. When given our room we found that the bed wasn't made up, the toilet has been used and was not flushed as if someone had just used the room before we got there. Paid more than what I expected for the room.  Which wasn't really worth it.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your review. The issues you described are unacceptable, and I sincerely apologize for your experience. I am working with our front desk staff to ensure that this situation does not happen again in the future. We continually work to improve our hotel, so thank you for your feedback.

review.title: Location is good
review.reviewText: Sheets were dirty, checked out early in the morning and no attendant was present despite multiple calls to the phone number guests should call to get a hold of someone.  Location was good.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I'm thrilled that we were able to provide you with a home away from home experience! I’m so glad you enjoyed our convenient location and quiet atmosphere. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.reviewText: Quite location not too far from airport, much better than America best inn and travellodge nearby.

review.title: Only good for one night, definitely not extended
review.reviewText: Staff was somewhat unavailable. It was hard to get a hold of the Front Desk. Its nice to have the kitchenette and the floors were nice. However, anything that you need for the kitchen has to be requested and again is hard to reach the Front Desk. Towels from the bathroom were clearly not softened and some stained. Bathroom was not spotless clean. Had to kill a medium sized spider in the bathroom and a small one on top of my bed. Fridge had a bad odor. Cables behind the nightstand were dusty. I had to stay there for 5 nights and was very desperate to leave. Thebfew times I dealt with the staff they were nice people. But Im afraid this is not a chain that I would use again based on this experience.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. I sincerely apologize for the cleanliness issues you experienced. In response to your feedback, I am ordering new sheets and will talk with all of the housekeepers about using the proper sheets for the proper bed type. Additionally, I will make sure we are thoroughly cleaning and inspecting our rooms to our company’s high standards. Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any other Extended Stay Hotels location in the future.

review.title: Horrible experience!
review.reviewText: We checked in to our room and found a nasty black shirt on the couch! The room looks like nobody has cleaned it. The front desk lady was super rude and mean. Don't exp too much about the breakfast. It only goes till 9:30 but all the food will be gone by 9 and they refused to add more! The bed in the room was a disaster. The sheet is too small for the bed so it keep getting undone. We were basically sleeping directly on the mattress! So gross! Will never ever go back again!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your stay. I'm so glad to hear that our staff provided you with excellent customer service! I’m thrilled you found our hotel to be a great value. Thank you again for your review. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Clean, sweet staff
review.reviewText: Room was great for the price. The young gentleman who checked us in was very professional and sweet, forgot his name (checked in 7/3).

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. I am sorry to hear that your bed was too firm. Still, I am glad to hear you had an enjoyable stay overall and that you found us to be a good value. Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback. We look forward to seeing you in the future, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Ok for a night or two
review.reviewText: Hotel exterior was nice but staying more than a few nights I would suggest a different location. Room was fairly clean bathroom looked like it needed some remodeling. Bed was a little too firm but for the price not to horrible.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. I am sorry to hear that the room type you selected was not available and the cleanliness of the room was not up to standards. In response to your feedback, I am working with our staff daily to improve the cleanliness of the rooms. I am also having our mechanical engineer take a look at the refrigerator and if we canât fix it I will work to have it replaced. Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any of our other brand locations across the U.S. and Canada in the future.

review.title: NEVER AGAIN
review.reviewText: I RESERVED A ROOM WITH 2 QUEEN BEDS 3 DAYS BEFORE MY ARRIVAL. WHEN I GOT THERE THEY ONLY HAD A ROOM WITH ONE BED SO I HAD TO SLEEP ON A ROLL A WAY BED THAT WAS SO UNCOMFORTABLE THAT I HAD TO SLEEP ON THE DIRTY FLOOR. THE ROOM WAS FILTHY, THE REFRIGERATOR WAS SO LOUD I HAD TO UNPLUG IT. THE WALLS MUST BE PAPER THIN BECAUSE ALL NIGHT I HEARD THE FREEWAY TRAFFIC AND THE PEOPLE  IN THE NEXT ROOM. I WAS CHARGED OVER 300.00 DOLLARS FOR THAT ROOM FOR ONE NIGHT. IVE STAYED IN CHEAP MOTELS FOR 39.99 THAT WERE A THOUSAND TIMES BETTER.
review.negativeRemarks: ALMOST EVERYTHING NEEDS TO BE IMPROVED.

review.title: Didn't like hotel at all...will not go back
review.reviewText: Say the have breakfast...I wouldn't call it that.  Not modern.....didn't seem clean,,,no housekeeping.
review.negativeRemarks: Where do I start
review.locationRemarks: I was busy, could not tell you.

review.title: Quiet Place Close to Everything
review.reviewText: We've stayed in San Carlos before at other hotels, but hadn't been happy with those so we thought we'd try Extended Stay Suites.  Our room was very quiet, which was nice because it is near Highway 101.  We didn't hear noises from neighboring rooms, nor noise from outside.  All we heard was an occasional door slam from an inconsiderate guest.  Beds were very comfortable!  The hotel does seem to be set up for a lot of long-term residents and the lobby is more of a "desk clerk" space; don't expect a large, comfortable lobby.  We ended up having coffee each morning just down the street at Starbucks as we weren't aware there was coffee or any breakfast items in the room next to the desk clerk's space.  We found out by reading reviews once we got home!  We will return again next visit!
review.negativeRemarks: Better communication from hotel staff that coffee and breakfast items were available and what hours.
review.locationRemarks: Just down the street is Starbucks, Chipotle Grill, juice bar, eatery for wings, Best Buy, clothing store.

managementResponses.response: Jeff - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I apologize for the issues you experienced with the faucet and cleanliness in your room. I will be meeting with our housekeeping and maintenance staffs to ensure these issues do not continue in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Help me I am lost in an Industrial Area
review.reviewText: I traveled to Redwood City for a training class and only needed a hotel to sleep at.  When I got in the hotel room, I was glad to see that it was clean.  It was not until later the day of check in that I noticed the water faucet in the kitchen area did not work.  I also had small ants (possibly sugar ants) crawling on my bed that I noticed the last of my three night stay.  Also the toilet did not flush well and had to flush a couple times just to clear it.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked that it was only about four miles from my training class and only took me about 10-15 minutes to get there.
review.negativeRemarks: Don't allow dogs to board there.  There was a person staying there with a barking dog that started early in the morning.
review.locationRemarks: There were no good restaurants near by and I did not see any attractions that were close to do in the afternoons after I got out of training.

review.reviewText: I did not enjoy my stay at this hotel. It was one step above hostel. I was given a key to a room and walked in and it was into someone else's room!

managementResponses.response: Carol - Thank you for taking the time to write a review of our hotel. I am glad to hear that you found our hotel to be quiet and in a convenient location. Still, I apologize that our staff did not inform you that coffee makers and other kitchen supplies are available to all guests upon request. I will be working with our staff to ensure this does not happen in the future. Thank you for bringing this to our attention. We hope to have the opportunity to see you again, should your travels bring you back to our area.

review.title: Quiet hotel - convenient location
review.reviewText: A little disappointed when entering the hotel but, in spite of no amenities, the hotel was clean, quiet and served our needs.  We needed a place to sleep only as we traveled the area all day - not a lot of amenities but the room was very clean and comfortable.  Free breakfast, but you needed to go to the lobby to get coffee - no coffeemaker in room.  Only the basics in the room.
review.negativeRemarks: coffeemaker and coffee in room
review.locationRemarks: in an industrial area but close to the 101

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport
review.reviewText: It was a very good, new and comfortable hotel, next to SF.

review.title: Less expensive hotel near San Francisco
review.reviewText: Hotel is located just off the highway about 15 min or so south of San Francisco Airport.  It is on the edge of an industrial area in San Carlos, but it is a lovely place to stay.  The rooms are nicely decorated and quite comfortable with a flat screen TV, mini-kitchen with apt size fridge and comfortable bed.  There are laundry facilities on premises.  Shower is good and strong with plenty of hot water.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing comes to mind.
review.locationRemarks: Just down the road is downtown Redwood City, with many shops, restaurants, a movie theater, and the Fox theater.  Lots to do and see.

review.title: Pleasant 4-day stay
review.reviewText: We were two adults, two kids and my dog. I didn't get to use the kitchen but it was very clean, spacious, and fully equipped! The bathroom was clean and spacious too. The king size bed and the queen size sofa bed were very comfortable! My requests were handled promptly. The staff was polite and accommodating.
review.negativeRemarks: I wish I could come up with something but my entire stay was very pleasant.
review.locationRemarks: Good location next to the freeway, three gas stations within a mile, a variety of restaurants and fast food within walking distance.

managementResponses.response:
Thank you for your recent review of your stay. We are glad that you had a comfortable stay and that our staff provided you with quality service; however, we apologize that your phone was not able to connect to our free Wi-Fi. We will be working with our internet provider to address this issue.

Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.title: Great stay at a good price
review.reviewText: It's close to the freeway and you can't hear the traffic.  It's about half a mile to restaurants but it's not like you're walking.  The lady at the check in was excellent and even changed my room when I realized my room was smoking.  WiFi was great on my laptop; never could connect on my phone.
review.negativeRemarks: WiFi won't connect on my phone

managementResponses.response: I appreciate you taking the time to write a review of your experience with us. I am so disappointed to read of the cleanliness issues in your room. Please accept my apology. As this hotel’s manager, I can assure you that I have spoken with our housekeeping staff and reviewed cleanliness standards with them to ensure that your experience is not repeated. Thank you very much for bringing this to my attention. I do hope that you will return to our hotel, or any other Extended Stay America location in the future.

review.title: Smelly,  dirty. Hotel
review.reviewText: I didn't like the hotel the room was dirty and refrigerator was greasy. Towels were old and smelled. The pillow case looked like they never were washed. it's supposed to be a non-smoking hotel but outside the room it smelled smoked and other stuff.

managementResponses.response:
Your review for our hotel was recently brought to my attention. I am very sorry that our hotel did not meet your expectations. As this hotel's manager, I can assure you that I am working with our staff to improve our offerings and services moving forward. Still, I am glad that you liked having a fully equipped kitchen in your room.

I really appreciate you bringing this to our attention. I do hope that you will return to our hotel or any of our other brand locations across the U.S. and Canada in the future.

review.title: Cheap, old, dirty, hairy, beware!
review.reviewText:
The only reason why I booked this hotel was because it was cheap in comparison to other area hotels. In comparison to the price I would pay somewhere else in another state or region, it fails completely. Upon arriving, I was asked to fill out a form requesting my vehicle information and other personal info. This took about 10 minutes as I had to literally go out to my vehicle and find the VIN number to write down on the form. This was very inconvenient and really annoying. It took way too long to check in.

As soon as we got our room, I went into the bathroom only to find really dirty towels folded out for me. How do I know they were dirty? There was pubic hair and strands of hair folded in between the towels. There was even a piece of hair hanging from the towel rack. It was so disgusting. I'm really disappointed and will never stay here again.

The hotel is in a very industrialized area right off the highway. It was loud and the scenery was pathetic. There is no way to turn left when you leave the hotel lot, you have to turn right and then do an illegal u-turn or turn into a driveway to turn back to the highway or main streets.

There is no clear sign where the driveway of the hotel is so we passed the driveway the first time (it was a small shared driveway to local businesses).
review.positiveRemarks: It had a kitchen area and some basic utensils
review.negativeRemarks: Cleanliness, updating decor, counter and bed sheets
review.locationRemarks: There's an ihop, gas station and it's right off the highway. No way to do a quick left turn back to where you came.

managementResponses.response: Thank you for the feedback about your stay at our hotel. I am sorry to hear that you were placed in a smocking room. In response to your feedback, I am working with staff to help prevent this from happening in the future. As well, I apologize that your room was not cleaned prior to your arrival. I will be meeting with our housekeeping staff to review our cleaning standards and procedures to ensure your experience is not repeated. Thank you very much for providing us with your feedback. We hope that you will give us the opportunity to provide you with a better stay the next time you're in the area.

review.title: First Impressions Count - Mine? Never Again.
review.reviewText: Paid for Non-Smoking, got smoking because "Oh, you bought on Expedia" which apparently means you get uncleaned leftover rooms. Wasn't even cleaned!!! The pillows and bedding were used, bathroom was not clean. And we just couldn't get over the smell and feel of sleeping in cigarette ash.  Smoking is against our religion!

managementResponses.response: Thank you for your recent review of your stay. I’m happy to hear that you enjoyed your time at our hotel and the service our staff provided. Your feedback regarding our bedding options is greatly appreciated and it will help us in our efforts to continually improve our hotel. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

review.title: Nice hotel with good facilities.
review.reviewText:
I only stay in this hotel for one night. So, though the hotel facilities are really good, I didn't have a chance to use most of them. I booked this room through Expedia at 65 bucks one night, so everything is beyond my expectation!!

Generally, it is a very comfortable stay. The room is clean and spacious, the staff is very friendly......The only problem is the pillows have some funny smells, not strong for sure, but it makes this perfect stay almost perfect......
review.positiveRemarks: good facilities, friendly staff, spacious room

review.title: You can do much better somewhere else
review.reviewText:
Thank goodness I only had to stay here 1 night. I wouldn't recommend this hotel to anyone. Yes, it's one of the cheaper hotels in the area, and in this case, you definitely get what you pay for. I arrived late and the guy checking me in was very friendly and the only thing positive about my stay. He warned me ahead of time that the lock on the door didn't work and that the kitchen was clean despite the huge stain on the counter. At least he set my expectations fairly low. The room was dingy and outdated. The floors in the kitchen and bath had recently been redone, but everything else was from the Reagan era. The bed was rock hard - camping is seriously more comfortable than the bed. The pillows were ok, but 1 sheet and a very thin blanket didn't cut it. Also, even though the room had temperature controls, they didn't work. When I called the front desk, I was told that the room temps were perfect and I would adjust. Well, I didn't and froze all night long. Don't expect much for toiletries - a bar of soap was all they provide. TV choices are extremely limited. Make sure you have breakfast plans. Nice try saying breakfast is included. This consists of gross coffee, a granola bar or pre-packaged muffin.

One more thing - this hotel allows SMOKING everywhere!! I guess that's great if you are a smoker, but for those of us who aren't, this is nasty. I could smell it even in my non-smoking room. Yuck. I definitely won't be back EVER!
review.negativeRemarks: New beds, better bedding, decent breakfast, cleanliness, toiletries, make entire hotel non-smoking, update rooms

review.title: Nice spot
review.reviewText: Had a nice stay. Needed a hotel for an event in the area, clean room, nice front desk person.

review.title: An Odd Hotel
review.reviewText: There is a dearth of clean hotels, in Redwood City. Extended Stay is one of the few. It's clean, but there is no daily maid service, no room amenities (e.g. shampoo), unless they are requested at the desk, no fresh towels or linens, unless they are requested at the desk and exchanged for the used materials, and a complimentary breakfast that is lacking. On the other hand, the staff is pleasant, and the place is clean.

review.title: Convenient, safe, efficient
review.reviewText:
All was very good and met expectations.
Room was clean and neat.
Needed shampoo...but none in room.
review.negativeRemarks: Shampoo.

review.title: Ok hotel dog friendly
review.reviewText:
Dog friendly which is ok but should only designate certain rooms for that I have allegergies

Front desk girl very nice our key wouldn't work room next door had big family and barking dog when we tried to get in room went back down to front desk she gave us upgrade and new room

review.title: Very nice for the price
review.reviewText: We picked this hotel for its proximity to relatives in San Carlos and because it was pet friendly. The base room price was extremely reasonable for the area, although a pet adds $25 a night. Nice size and configuration of the room. Because it's an extended stay inn, it has a fully operational kitchen, complete with a residential refrigerator, as well as real cups, plates and glasses. There is a small snack bar with two stools plus the usual desk/chair combo. Bathroom was wonderful. Lots of counter space, very good lighting (for putting on makeup or shaving), big drawers for storage. Separate spacious toilet/shower area. Good water pressure in the shower. Instead of vinyl flooring, wet areas had faux wood flooring, which was never cold. However, as to the bed: the blanket wasn't large enough for the bed and the spread kept sliding off. Pillows weren't very comfortable, either. However, the overall experience was very pleasant and we will stay there again. The "continental breakfast" was not very substantial, consisting of packaged muffins, granola bars, oatmeal, apples and oranges. Only two chairs in the "dining" area.
review.positiveRemarks: Very easy to get to from the freeway; price; room amenities
review.negativeRemarks: Better blankets and pillows
review.locationRemarks: Hotel is within a couple of blocks of a small shopping center. The general San Carlos area is full of restaurants and shops.

review.title: Stay away
review.reviewText: Make sure to request non smoking floor and a quiet floor. This hotel seems to allow smoking in the hallways and is very noisy. Mattresses and like bricks

review.title: A good place to stay for a few days
review.reviewText: Staff was friendly. Desk staff isn't always available but contacting them by house phone got someone to your assistance pretty fast. I made a mistake in my reservation (smoking room) and they accommodated a change the next day, which I greatly appreciated. Good value and convenient to some pretty good restaurants, shopping areas and main routes.
review.locationRemarks: Aquello Plaza has a lot of shops, grocery, restaurants, bus line, train line, etc.

review.title: Not bad.
review.reviewText: Good.
review.negativeRemarks: No good kitchen.
review.locationRemarks: Not bad.

review.title: Desperate
review.reviewText: I needed a place to stay fast. It was a cheap rate, but I got what I paid for...$79 for the night. Reviews were good, so I thought Id be ok, just 1 night right?... Well, gum wrappers and unvacuumed floors greeted me. So I was disappointed immediately. I checked the sheets and sure enough.... Although Im sure they were laundered I could smell the bleach, there was a very noticeable old blood stain on the mattress cover. I could see it throught the fitted sheet. Im an RN, things happen. But seriously, spend $40 to replace the matress cover in room 244!!

review.title: San Francisco Trip
review.reviewText: Awsome place. especially since it had a kitchen made it way convenient if you travel with kids.

review.title: No one to be found
review.reviewText: No shampoo or toiletries provided. When we went down to request nobody was there to talk too. Came back to room, tried calling, no one picked up. Upon see a cleaning lady, we asked for toilet paper, she was reluctant to give it to us, asked for our room number, wrote it down like we were lying. She finally gave it to us, after we stood there for a bit. Awkward.

review.title: Nice room
review.reviewText: Nice room. The breakfast bar was a bit sparse but doable.
review.positiveRemarks: The room had a lot of nice features.
review.negativeRemarks: The breakfast bar.
review.locationRemarks: We were in route to friends so did not seek out "things to do nearby"/ San Carlos , however, is a beautiful community. Close to SF .

review.title: Fine for the cost
review.reviewText: Stayed one night, enjoyed our stay. Breakfast was lacking.

review.title: decaf coffee
review.reviewText: Suggestion; It would be easy to add a few packets of instant decaf coffee to your comp breakfast table. The walk to Starbucks is short, but in rain and colder weather it could be challenging.
review.negativeRemarks: add decaf packets of instant coffee to your morning breakfast

review.title: Decent hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was OK. Price was reasonable. Breakfast was pretty slim = plastic-wrapped muffins, granola bars and some apples.
review.negativeRemarks: Better breakfast! And, since there's a kitchenette in the room, a wine bottle opener would have been helpful.

review.title: A hotel close to center of Silicon Valley.
review.reviewText: A pet friendly hotel, but charged per night with no room housekeeping everyday. This seems not reasonable. Grab-and-Go breakfast is too simple. Others are OK.

review.title: Great Hotel fear airport
review.reviewText: We used this hotel for a night before dropping our rental car off at the airport- about 11 miles from the airport and a bit out of the way but a 2 minute drive to a pretty little town with lots of nice restaurants. The hotel itself is modern and clean with lots of parking, comfortable bed, spacious rooms and we had a kitchenette so could cook ourselves a meal which was great!! Perfect for what we needed!

review.title: Nice hotel away from traffic noise
review.reviewText: Hotel is nice due to location. Big PLUS!!!! It's on a pretty much industrial/commercial street, so evening hour traffic noise was minimal. Far enough away from 101, but easily accessible.
review.positiveRemarks: free high speed wi-fi, adequate parking, kitchens were nice to save some money on meals
review.negativeRemarks: breakfast was pretty skimpy, slow elevator
review.locationRemarks: sufficient shopping/dining options, easy access to Hwy 101 and 82

review.title: Never again
review.reviewText: Rooms were not fully stocked staff was gone non smoking room smelled terriblely of smoke sheet had blood on it and breakfast if you can call it that was not good

review.title: Side door card reader broken
review.reviewText:
It soon is we walk into the bathroom toilet pee stains and duty inside the bowl
In the morning went to get complementary breakfast they only had coffee and apples
review.negativeRemarks: Better cleaning and better breakfast
review.locationRemarks: Went to see san Francisco state university

review.title: Not a good hotel if you are going with kids
review.reviewText: I had a bad experience. I went with my family including two kids and feel that this is not a hotel even at 12 o'clock in afternoon kids are not allowed to play or run around in the room. Second there is no housekeeping you have to clean the room and trough the trash.

review.title: Quiet and convenient
review.reviewText: It's very nice to have a kitchen. Nobody come to bother you while you staying.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Good, clean hotel in convenient location. Nice kitchen.

review.title: Nice, clean hotel
review.reviewText: I needed a couple of things but nobody was at the desk a couple of times.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked the kitchen and the cleanliness. Good selection of channels on tv. Free, easy to access Wi-Fi connection.
review.negativeRemarks: A little more selection of food for breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Close by to shopping

review.title: Not Recommended for Business Travelers!
review.reviewText:
Room was clean but had no bathroom amenities (shampoo/condition) just a very small piece of soap near sink. Hotel appeared to be temp housing for local correction facility since there were police officers in front of hotel several mornings. One evening I overheard a young lady with her personal belongings in a clear plastic bag checking out with the front desk saying that she was checking out early because they told her she had to go to prison tonight abd there were other young men and women gathering at the front of the hotel with the police officers. Other rooms in the hotel were occupied by several construction crew members so hotel carpets and hallways often had a trail of dust and dirt from their work boots each day.

For your money, it's worth driving north a couple of miles on Hwy 101 to stay at the Extended Stay America in Belmont. Much better location, more professional staff, and hotel more modern with amenities in each room. Make sure if you need a hair dryer though, to request it from the front desk. Don't wait til early morning when you are getting ready to go to work. You'll have to come down to the hotel lobby to get it - :(

review.title: Served the purpose..
review.reviewText: Bed was good, and that's all I needed the room for. It's rated 3 star and that's all it deserves. Price was good, for the Bay Area
review.negativeRemarks: Maintenance

review.title: Safe area, clean, but problems.
review.reviewText: My daughters and I felt very safe in the area. The room was great. Clean. Only thing wrong was a missing light cover in sink area. The night personnel could not speak English well enough to give us directions when our GPS steered us wrong. Another guest in the lobby had to help us. There was no security to handle our very boisterous neighbors and the same personnel spoke to them only to ask if they were having a problem but no they were not too loud. Another language barrier. We would have had to call the police if there was really a problem so we were nervous the rest of the night. Also they do not answer the front desk from the room at night. I had to call the hotel from my cell phone to get an answer. Breakfast very minimal - no milk or juice for kids.
review.negativeRemarks: No hotel security. Night personnel did not speak English well enough to communicate effectively. Disappointing breakfast.
review.locationRemarks: Safe sort of industrial business area.

review.title: A Nice Place to Stay
review.reviewText: Very Clean, comfortable and maintained well. No remote in the room for tv and when I wiped up water off the floor, the towel came up pretty black.
review.negativeRemarks: No place to walk my dog
review.locationRemarks: A bit far away from SF

review.title: Not for stays less than a week
review.reviewText: This hotel is more useful for people who are staying for a week or longer has full kitchen with silverware pots and pans in rooms. They do not offer housekeeping for rooms that are not staying longer than a week if I remember correctly. For my husband and I who only stayed two nights, the stay was not very beneficial. No toothpaste in the rooms, decaffeinated coffee in room with a non working telephone to call guest service. Bath tub looked like it could be been better cleaned. We had a King suite but no balcony. Did not try the free breakfast was never up early enough. Those were the cons. For pros it served its purpose a place to sleep and had ample parking and free wifi. About two blocks away there is a 24 hour fitness gym.
review.negativeRemarks: not for less than a week stay
review.locationRemarks: easy to find gym nearby

review.title: Good Hotel
review.reviewText: The hotel was very well priced and comfortable. The room was clean but the bathtub not so much. There where no shampoo bottles or toiletries, but overall a nice place for the price.
review.negativeRemarks: Bathtub.

review.title: Very nice, inexpensive room
review.reviewText: Highly recommend staying here! Nice staff!!! Safe and easy parking, clean room, close to downtown. Inexpensive!
review.negativeRemarks: Cheaper
review.locationRemarks: I don't know much.. Mine was a quick stay! It was close to downtown.

review.title: Bad experience
review.reviewText: Ill equipped staff and poorly cleaned and stocked room. Last time I will stay at this chain.

review.title: Great for family
review.reviewText: The hotel was not plush but served the purpose for an overnight. The kitchen was very convenient. The continental breakfast was adequate.
review.negativeRemarks: Only one nightstand
review.locationRemarks: Close to US 101

review.title: Good hotel for 1 or 2 nights
review.reviewText: Good and nice hotel. About 30-40 minutes ride from pier 39 of san francisco. Hotel is clean and a good place to stay for 1 or 2 nights. Would not stay there for a week (Only breakfast is instant cereal, muffins and fruit and no pool). It's just a place to sleep.

review.title: Great Place
review.reviewText: Great place to relax after a long trip....everyone was great

review.title: trip to San carlos
review.reviewText: Was very please with my stay. Much beter than I had anticipated. Great value for the money. The staff was just great in every way.
review.negativeRemarks: nothing if you have a car
review.locationRemarks: great location and easy to get around. close to freeway and most exciting things around the city

review.title: Spartan Stay
review.reviewText: No shampoo in room. Spartan interior. No breakfast. No place to talk to for a coffee, drink, etc. You are limited to the coffee maker in the room and after that be prepared to drive to get anything.

review.title: Quiet neighborhood
review.reviewText: Definitely off the beaten path....nestled between office building and residential neighborhood. Not any direct access from the freeway. Friendly, accomodating staff. Front desk person took into consideration that I was by myself, so she wanted to make sure I was in a section that was quiet as there was a large male population of guests checked in on one section of the same floor.

review.title: Needs overall refreshing.
review.reviewText:
The furnishings ( easy chair is why I stay there!) badly need recovering or replacing. The Hotel needs a facelift. Curtains dirty and torn, bath and shower aspecially need to be replaced .
I want a kitchenette, when I travel and an easy chair and ottoman. But not dirty ones!!!!!!
Found dirty pots and pans when I checked in.
Please invest in clean up!!!

review.title: Terrible management and Dirty hotel
review.reviewText: The rooms where dirty and the customer service was terrible.

review.title: not impresses
review.reviewText: room was not clean. Stains on the wall (looked like someone blew their nose and rubbed it on the wall). Toilet was not cleaned. Room has 70's vibe. Hated it!

review.title: Pretty comfortable.
review.reviewText: I do recommend this hotel but expect to clean after yourself. They only have a once a week cleaning so if you only stay there for 3 days, they will not clean the room. The staff is pretty friendly and welcoming.

review.title: Not great!
review.reviewText: The Hotel itself does not seem bad but the service & being clean was not up to par. I killed at least three large spiders in the room, the counters in the kitchen and the bathroom were not as clean as I would like. After searching for the ice maker & the vending machine I went to the lobby and they had only one area where they were located which was next to the lobby and when I asked for change at the front counter, they would not give me change for my $10 bill so I could not even use the machine and ended up driving to a 7-eleven.

review.title: Good Value
review.reviewText: This hotel is good for extended stay as well as one night customers.
